item.title: Trump gives Hamas Sunday deadline to accept Gaza peace plan
item.description: The 20-point proposal seeks to end the fighting immediately in return for the release of hostages and detained Gazans.

item.title: Behind the Gen Z protesters who want to force Madagascar's president from power
item.description: President Rajoelina's move fails to quell the protest movement that is now threatening his own position.

item.title: Celebrations in Luxembourg as new Crown Duke sworn in
item.description: Grand Duke Henri of Luxembourg has abdicated, handing over the throne to his eldest son, Grand Duke Guillaume.

item.title: Four Gaza flotilla activists deported by Israel
item.description: The four already deported are Italian citizens, the Israeli foreign ministry says.

item.title: Fathers entitled to equal parental leave, South Africa's top court rules
item.description: The ruling grants both parents the right to share a total of four months and 10 days of parental leave.
